mapper.select: /* findSchTitleBySchmSeq */ SELECT IFNULL(MAX(tss.SCHM_SEQ) ,'1') AS schmSeq , IFNULL(MAX(tss.SCH_SEQ) ,'2') AS schSeq , IFNULL(MAX(tss.SCHM_SEQ) ,'1') AS schmSeq1 , IFNULL(MAX(tss.SCH_SEQ) ,'2') AS schSeq1 , IFNULL(MAX(tss.SCHM_SEQ) ,'1') AS schmSeq2 , IFNULL(MAX(tss.SCH_SEQ) ,'2') AS schSeq2 , IFNULL(MAX(tss.SCHM_SEQ) ,'1') AS schmSeq3 , IFNULL(MAX(tss.SCH_SEQ) ,'2') AS schSeq3 , IFNULL(MAX(tss.SCHM_SEQ) ,'1') AS schmSeq4 , IFNULL(MAX(tss.SCH_SEQ) ,'2') AS schSeq4 FROM t_sc_sch tss WHERE 1 = 1;
